description:
The investment seeks investment results that correspond to the BUZZ NextGen AI US Sentiment Leaders Index.
 The fund will invest at least 90% of its net assets in securities that comprise the underlying index. It employs a "passive management" - or indexing - investment approach designed to track the performance of the underlying index. The underlying index utilizes a rules-based quantitative methodology developed by BUZZ Indexes Inc. (the "index provider"), which is designed to identify the U.S. common stocks with the most "positive insights" collected from social media networks. The fund is non-diversified.
